Today we're looking at the works of fictional author Terrence Voss, who wrote the acclaimed Starshade Trilogy. The first book, Dusk Over Meridian, was published in nineteen eighty-seven and introduced readers to the concept of chronal drift. Voss drew inspiration from his time studying geology in New Zealand, where the landscape itself seemed to shift between eras. The second book, The Amber Threshold, expanded the universe considerably.
